heading: Chefs Helping the Homeless
description: the event: ‘Chefs Helping the Homeless' Eventthe cause: More than 1,200 attendees raised $63,000 at the annual event held to help reduce homelessness in Broward County. The evening began with a cocktail reception, followed with a limousine ride to one of 18 restaurants where guests enjoyed multi-course gourmet meals.
